item.description:
Pot Luck Supper & Yankee swap Holiday Party for Gentiles, Jews, Muslims, Agnostics and Even athiests - Presbyterian's require special permission !

We strongly encourage flannels with cozy slippers. Those not in festive garb will be required to sing for the rest of us. After they clean the dishes.

Hot toddies, Egg Nog with Captain Morgan's and nutmeg and lot's of kissing under the mistletoe ! (Except for Bennaye she never waits for the mistletoe anyway)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy with the Santa Outfit

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club
